TopicTitle: LLL - Lack Luster Labs - Development Thread

Articles.Content:
Hey. Is there planned IVAs for the cockpits, and some example ships?

Edited July 30, 2013 by Benie

sent a triple L base to duna

http://i.imgur.com/rMMpnJO.png

Does anyone know where the heat on the front comes from?

http://i.imgur.com/rMMpnJO.png

Does anyone know where the heat on the front comes from?

They're a LLL part, under utility.

Hey. Is there planned IVAs for the cockpits, and some example ships?

I dont have an answer for this but I sure hope so, love custom IVAs.

Lack, could I maybe please please please get a blender compatible model for the 4x2 module?

I want to make a hydrogen scoop kind of like a bussard ramscoop to capture fuel for use in an antimatter factory. I'm thinking of using 2 4x2 modules for the factory, then a THSS octostrut as storage for the antimatter. (I want to make the models first and work from there)

Would it be OK to use your models?
And only one thing I think is missing, 1x1 engines for fighters...
Do we have an ETA on a .21 update?

Do we have an ETA on a .21 update?

I'll have to go with 'Soon'. My anti-virals had me knocked out of commission for the past while, but I finished the course today so should be a bit more clear headed. For now just use the fix posted a few pages back, bar SAS everything should be .21 compatible.

I did get a bit of work done last weekend though, re-did the windows etc, so here's a peak.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Thanks for all the hard work, and definitely sorry to hear you're not feeling so great. Stupid little invasive viruses...

Those new parts look awesome!

The new command pod looks like an I-7 Howlrunner from the Star Wars universe to me too

Also nice to see you made a LLL shaped decoupler!
Sorry to hear that you have been sick but glad to hear you are getting better. Can't wait to get this mod back into my game.

I'll have to go with 'Soon'. My anti-virals had me knocked out of commission for the past while, but I finished the course today so should be a bit more clear headed. For now just use the fix posted a few pages back, bar SAS everything should be .21 compatible.

I did get a bit of work done last weekend though, re-did the windows etc, so here's a peak.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I like. Question, are you gonna add a 2x1 docking port by any chance?

Sorry to hear your under the weather!

Can't wait to have this mod again

Couple questions. I have recently finished a rather large FPS destroying ship and I have seen parts that I do not have. Am looking for the most current version, and if I do not have that and I update to the most current version of LLL then will I be screwed and have to build the ship again?

Thanks

Bear

I'll have to go with 'Soon'. My anti-virals had me knocked out of commission for the past while, but I finished the course today so should be a bit more clear headed. For now just use the fix posted a few pages back, bar SAS everything should be .21 compatible.

I did get a bit of work done last weekend though, re-did the windows etc, so here's a peak.

Dude- this is cool.

REALLY DAMN COOL.
Is that a wet workshop?
LLL really makes things look amazing.

Right, got a cargo hold done.

So does this mean we can expect a new LLL soon?

Question and Comment. Well done on the cargo bay. But where in the _____ (fill in own explicitive) are there trees on Kerbin?

the trees are located about fifteen metras north south west of KSC 2

(trees are terrain scatter, like rocks on the mun, this is disabled by default)

Looks good!

Lack, was that drone flyable or did you use the parachute at first chance?

Looks good!

Lack, was that drone flyable or did you use the parachute at first chance?

It was sort of, but I did end up loosing control coming down. It needs more wings and some air-brakes really.

My drone shuttle worked much better and could glide back down to terra firma

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I love this parts set! I try to work them into pretty much everything I build now, if not use them exclusively. I think you've done an amazing job on this pack, Lack (oops, lol, unintentional rhyme there), and I look forward to new parts a.s.a.p.! Just one question: When do the rest of us get to play with all of these new parts? Or are you just going to keep them all to yourself and tease us unmercifully with more photos? Lol, kidding... at least I HOPE I am! And I guess that was two questions, oops. Anyway...

Again, fantastic work so far, Lack, and I look forward to the new parts as soon as they're released!
Yea, this is what I want for Christmas (please release before that)!
